<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#16644](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16644.html) (scripts: attempt to fix some translations i
Why not include the other scripts in devtools as well then? They might get updated in the future as well.
Could you update the link to the script in the maintainers repo once the PR is being merged?

> Why not include the other scripts in devtools as well then? They might get updated in the future as well.\n\nI might update this to include `gen-manpags.sh`. I don't think everything in `devtools/` needs to be moved into the maintainer repo, because they aren't all maintainer tools.

ACK 3d50fe2c1fb566501257fc16d4606e06f518a0bb 
this was merged to maintainer-tools n bitcoin-core/bitcoin-maintainer-tools#31

>Why not include the other scripts in devtools as well then? They might get updated in the future as well.

Maybe. Let's discuss these on a case by case basis.
